ab.note: The characters ο and υ have a spiritus.
The characters στρω are marked by an overline indicating a nomen sacrum in a verb.

The words from ουτε ψυχας ανθρωπων till απολαυσιν does not belong to the text of Rev properly. Originally, they belong to the commentary of Andrew (cf. J. Schmid (ed.), Studien I/b, p.198). In this respect, thy crept from an examplar containing also the commentary of Andrew into the text of Rev.
